document_data.name: Skovac
document_data.alignment: [[Neutral evil]]{{Cite adventurers league/The Courting of Fire|21}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Skovac''' was a [[wight]] in the [[Dragonspire Mountains]] in [[1489 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Skovac's only objective was to protect the temple's relic. He was bitter in undeath and resented the living.{{Cite adventurers league/The Courting of Fire|16}}
document_data.History:
In life, Skovac was the leader of the [[Circle of the Scale]], a group of [[druid]] worshiping [[dragon]]s in a temple in the Dragonspire Mountains. However, he proclaimed that thanks to a scale of [[Tiamat]] herself, he could dominate all dragons.

One day, the [[red dragon]] [[Scorlworyx]] attacked the Circle and killed most of the members bar Skovac. He sealed himself inside the temple with the relic. In time, he became a wight.

In 1489 DR, the reformed [[Cult of the Dragon]] agents [[Tibeem]] and [[Spernik]] discovered the whole story of Skovac.{{Cite adventurers league/The Courting of Fire|5-6}} In order to gain the alliance of Scorlworyx, Spernik and a host of [[kobold]]s reached the temple.{{Cite adventurers league/The Courting of Fire|11}} However, an adventuring party hired to capture Spernik also found the location. In the temple, the adventurers killed Skovac.
